A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have sooooo many issues with it. Felt attachment to nobody. Too many plot lines at once. Really stupid obvious jokes. No mysticism or hero’s journey present. I can go on and on. I know everyone will love it. It’s just feeding into blind fan boy culture. Star Wars has lost all its heart\, storytelling and passion and traded it for fast paced video game\, fanboy fame culture. These movies once told great trials of being a human and making meaning of your life journey. Now it’s just..pew pew pew.
